monster.name: Expert
languages: i un altre de la teva elecció

trait.name: D'ajuda
entries: L'expert pot Ajudar com a acció bonus. La criatura que rep l'ajuda rep {@dice 1d6} extra a la tirada {@dice d20}. Si la tirada és d'impacte, la criatura pot no afegir el bonus a impactar i, si l'atac impacta, la criatura pot afegir el bonus al mal contra un objectiu.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: When the expert is not {@condition incapacitated} and subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Destresa saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it failed.

trait.name: Eines
entries: The expert has thieves' tools and a musical instrument.

action.name: Atac Extra
entries: The expert can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the attack action on its turn.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The esquelet gegant de tauró té avantatge a impactar a melé contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de cop.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Lhammaruntosz's spellcasting ability is Carisma (spell save {@dc 17}). She pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Lhammaruntosz is an 8th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Carisma (spell save {@dc 17}; {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de fetiller preparats:

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: Lhammaruntosz pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: If Lhammaruntosz fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: Lhammaruntosz regains 5 hit points at the start of her turn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Lhammaruntosz can use her Frightful Presence. She then fa tres atacs: one with her bite and two with her claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Presència Aterradora
entries: Each creature of Lhammaruntosz's choice that is within 120 feet of her and aware of her must succeed on a {@dc 17} Saviesa saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Lhammaruntosz's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
entries: Lhammaruntosz uses one of the following breath weapons.

action.name: Lightning Breath
entries: Lhammaruntosz exhales lightning in a 90- foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 19} Destresa saving throw. Qui falli rep 66 ({@damage 12d10}) de dany elèctric; si supera, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Repulsion Breath
entries: Lhammaruntosz exhales repulsion energy en un con de 30 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must succeed on a {@dc 19} Força saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is pushed 60 feet away from the dragon.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: Lhammaruntosz magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than her own, or back into her true form. She reverts to her true form if she dies. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (Lhammaruntosz's choice).

In a new form, Lhammaruntosz retains her alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Resistència Llegendària, lair actions, and Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma scores, as well as this action. Her statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

legendary.name: Detectar
entries: Lhammaruntosz makes a Saviesa (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Atac de Cua
entries: Lhammaruntosz makes a atac de cua.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Lhammaruntosz beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of Lhammaruntosz must succeed on a {@dc 20} Destresa saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) de dany contundent and be knocked {@condition prone}. Lhammaruntosz can then fly up to half her flying speed.

monster.name: Conjurador (Sanador)
languages: i un altre de la teva elecció

spellcasting.name: Conjurador (Sanador)
headerEntries: The spellcaster's spellcasting ability is Saviesa (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The spellcaster has following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Truc Potenciat
entries: The spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent, o 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

monster.name: Spellcaster (Mage)
languages: i un altre de la teva elecció

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Mage)
headerEntries: The spellcaster's spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The spellcaster has following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Truc Potenciat
entries: The spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent, o 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

monster.name: Guerrer
languages: i un altre de la teva elecció

trait.name: Battle Readiness
entries: The warrior has advantage on initiative rolls.

trait.name: Improved Critical
entries: The warrior's attack rolls score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the {@dice d20}.

trait.name: Indomitable (1/Dia)
entries: The warriorcan reroll a saving throw that it fails, but it must use the new result.

trait.name: Martial Role
entries: The warrior has one of the following traits of your choice:

trait.name: Attacker
entries: The warrior gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

trait.name: Defender
entries: The warrior gains the Protection reaction below.

trait.name: Second Wind (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The warrior can use a bonus action on its turn to regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d10} + its level.

action.name: Atac Extra
entries: The warrior can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the attack action on its turn.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant, o 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Protecció (només Defensor)
entries: When a creature the warrior can see attacks a target other than the warrior that is within 5 feet of the warrior, the warrior can use their reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll. The warrior must be wielding a shield.
